title: Live Updates: At Least 23 People Injured in Brooklyn Subway Shooting - The New York Times
content:
1. Live Updates: At Least 23 People Injured in Brooklyn Subway Shooting  The New York Times
  2. Brooklyn subway shooting leaves 28 injured, 'dangerous' suspect at large: officials  Fox News
  3. At least 16 shot or hurt in NYC by man wearing gas mask, construction vest l ABC7  ABC7
  4. At least 29 injured in Brooklyn subway shooting, undetonated devices found  New York Post
  5. Everything Eric Adams Promised to Fight Subway Crime  Newsweek
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: A man set off smoke grenades in a crowded subway car and then opened fire, the police said. They named a ‘person of interest’ who rented a van they believe may be linked to the gunman, who is still at large.
